description: '''Free!!''' was a Spanish [[mákina]] group composed of Alberto Tapia and Pedro Miras. They are known for being one of the most representative groups of the 90's Spanish "Mákina" phenomenon, at the time when this genre crossed over from [[dance club]]s to the [[pop music]] arena. Popular songs by the group include "Doctor Beat", "This Groove", and "Kanashimi o Moyashite".
